mapper.select: SELECT manna.*, nickname, (SELECT (count(*) - 1) FROM joins WHERE manna_id = #{id}) as sum , filename, uuid, AVG(star) starAvg, COUNT(star) starCnt FROM manna LEFT OUTER JOIN user ON(manna.num = user.num) LEFT OUTER JOIN profile ON (user.num = profile.num) LEFT OUTER JOIN review ON (user.num = review.num) WHERE manna.id=#{id}
